column2: Tomb of Nitocris Found! Resting place of forgotten Queen uncovered.
The Tomb of Nitocris Found! Resting place of the forgotten Queen uncovered.
Tomb of Nitocris Found! Tomb of forgotten Queen uncovered.

The Tomb of Nitocris may not be packed with treasures, but a most exquisite piece of furniture has been found. An ancient Mirror of intricate design. The finders have requested that it should be given, as a symbol of gratitude for the aid provided, to the leader of their country...You.

Every day you stare into the Mirror of Nitocris, and every day the world seems a bit different. A bit more mundane. You can't understand why people would continue along that path while there is greater glory to be had in worshiping other entities.

The local inhabitants are getting distressed by the activities of the foreigners digging around their country. They seem afraid that old curses will be reawakened and turn the region into the home of evil beings.
The have rejected our request to expand our searches in the area. Should we allow them to order us around, or should we get our archaeologists to cease the search?
The Legendary Dark Pyramid has been found! Tomb of forgotten Pharaoh uncovered.'
